summary: Changes the number of firewood given per chop to 4, 5, 6, 10, 20 or 99! Now with handy NMM Installer!
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=20][b]Please note that the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]"Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade by kryptopyr"[/url] includes this functionality and I really REALLY recommend you get that instead of this. [/color][/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sSbds.png[/img]
A request by Vortaka, this simple script changes the number of firewood given per chop to 4, 5, 6, 10, 20 or 99!

If you want to create your own custom amount, it's actually very simple. All this script does is change line 88 of "resourcefurniturescript" from:
---
[b]akSource.AddItem(Resource, ResourceCount)[/b]
---
to
---
[b]akSource.AddItem(Resource, 99)[/b]
---
where 99 is the number of wood per chop desired.

I highly recommend combining this with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10976]No Axe or Pickaxe required[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9465]Faster Mining[/url] (both of which I use and vouch for, although Faster Mining is also in the Crafting Overhaul linked above) to make Mining and Chopping Wood far less tedious!

[b][u]Installation Instructions:[/b][/u]
Click the Download Button and then pick the version you want!
If you download it manually, simply extract the resourcefurniturescript.pex file to the ~/Data/Scripts folder of Skyrim.
